articles.description: HIGHLIGHTS | India vs Sri Lanka, 3rd ODI: A Destructive powerplay spell from Mohammed Siraj continued Sri Lanka's downfall for the third straight ODI, helping the hosts clinch a massive 317-runs win in the final ODI at Kerala on Sunday.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: How IPL disappointment spurred Siraj to success in white ball cricket - Rediff.com
articles.description: India pacer Mohammed Siraj said the disappointment of not being able to perform in IPL 2022 pushed him to focus more on white-ball cricket, which is paying rich dividends.
articles.content:
'When I did not have the inswing, I developed the wobbled seam. It took a lot of time to get effective and give me confidence.'
